text: avarkal; "nam avaraiyum (salihaiyum), avarutaiya kutumpattaraiyum iravotiravaka tittamaka alittu vituvom; (itanai yaritamum colvatillai) enru nam allahvin mitu cattiyam ceytu kolvomaka!" Piraku avarutaiya varistaritam (avarkal palikkuppali vanka vantal)"unkal kutumpattar alikkappattatai nankal kanaveyillai niccayamaka nankal unmaiyalarkal" enru tittamakak kurivitalam (enac cati ceytarkal)
